item.description:
Hey Incubators, short notice I know, but Lost Marlbes Improv, which features several of your wonderful incubator organizers, is performing a set of short form improv tonight at the Democracy Center!

Tonight!! Saturday Feb. 20th @ 8pm at the Democracy Center!!!

Come out and enjoy the improv comedy the antics of The Lost Marbles. We will perform several short form games and create funny, memorable scenes based on audience suggestions. It's all made up folks and it will make you laugh. Tickets are $10 or $7 for students.

And for those dying to get on stage, I guarantee some opportunities for audience participation!!

Hope to see some of you tonight!!

Oh and I also promise some Olympic quality action that's just as good as curling and hot curling pants!!

Cheers!

Jason
item.name: Incubator presents Lost Marbles Improv 2night!!!! 8pm at Democracy Center
